mapper.insert: INSERT INTO localComm(num, subject, content, hitCount, regDate, userId, siguNum, dongNum) VALUES (localComm_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content} ,#{hitCount}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{siguNum}, #{dongNum})
mapper.select: SELECT g.siguNum, g.siguName, dongNum, dongName FROM CATEGORYGU g JOIN DONG d ON d.siguNum = g.siguNum WHERE d.siguNum = #{siguNum}
